content: the april scrunchie is a quick little project inspired by the red carnations that became the symbol for the portuguese revolution against fascism it can be done in a day and will spice up any outfit that needs a little pop i achieved a gauge of about 21stst and 28rows over a 10x10cm square washed and blocked using 4mm needles and **the yarn held double** however considering the garment that is built the gauge is not very important note you will need a 4mm needle dpns or a longer circular needle that you can you with the magic loop technique a hair elastic and one other needle smaller than 4mm to keep sts on hold
